website_summaries.verdict: A great option for women looking to buy a pack of running underwear in bulk.
pros: Offered in a pack of 6 with different colors available for purchase
Moisture wicking and odor resistant fabric
cons: High-waist design was a little annoying for some

customer_reviews.title: They might come in different styles than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 6-packs of these underwear in the same style (on the same page). The “Aquatic Group ” color pack came as expected, but the pack of the “Blackberry/Tulip” color was not the same. They are a lot smaller and the cut on hip is cut much higher. When I contacted the company (Casual-21) they were not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great panties, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with these! I've been a diehard ExOfficio Women's Give-N-Go Hipster fan for years now. But recently ExOfficio switched their fabric to "Mesh" and now they are loose and stretched out feeling. These Balanced Tech underwear stay in place. Very comfortable fit. They would show a pantyline with certain pants, but don't show for 95% of my pants. A pad or pantyliner will stick to this fabric (in case anyone is wondering). Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: snwbordrgrl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hot Temps and Work Outs!  But Order a Size Smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised these panties are actually very comfortable and do wick the sweat away. I have worn these for working out, hiking, and in extremely hot environments and they didn't make me feel like I had a swamp between my legs... nice. The only problem I had was the size.... I generally wear a medium in Victoria's Secret panties (occasionally small), but these were too big for me in medium size and fit much better in small.
customer_reviews.author: StripeyS

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months and am pleased with their quality. They are quite breathable and very comfortable. The only change I would make would be to have the sides a smidge thinner, but I kind of knew from the picture they'd be a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: L Timpson

customer_reviews.title: Company needs to figure out sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love these balanced tech panties, but was quite disappointed in the size discrepancies between the last two packs that I purchased. I got the purple, lavender and black 3 pack a few months ago and fit was great, but the pink, blue and black 6 pack I just bought had same waist size but is about 2 inch higher cut which I dont like. The 6 pack also has balanced tech wording on the back which I dont like. Black pair is from the 3 pack, and pink pair is from the 6 pack. Balanced tech get your sizing consistent or your gonna be losing clients!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size was great!
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a medium or a large; I usually get a large bikini bottom for the extra coverage. I read some reviews about these being smaller than expected, but I ordered a medium anyway. These fit perfectly, a smidge big if anything. Love the material, soft and comfortable. I am 5'6", 145 pounds if that helps anyone narrow down their size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take that Humidity!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for everyday use because I live in NC and our summers are humid to the point of clothes feeling damp/ having trouble drying out after sweating. Worked great for every day use, so tested these out during a hot day of walking around an amusement park. Stayed dry and if I was dripping with sweat these quickly dried. They underwear are also very smooth lying compared to other active brands. I was skeptical given the price but these have held up great to a washer and dryer, keep odors to a minimum, lay flat, and stay dry. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Marie & Kenneth, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The cut was not what I would call “bikini” it was much thicker like boy short style. I bought these for a 2 week trip across Europe and I was miserable in them. The panel between the legs is too wide and the seem was too thick and it rolled and dug into the inside crease of my leg badly. I was incredibly uncomfortable in them and developed sore spots. I also hand washed these in the sink during my trip and I was shocked at how much the color bled. The water was pitch black after every rinse. I was hoping they would dry quickly, but it took 2 days for them to dry. I wouldn’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cummings

customer_reviews.title: True size- comfortable for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: I have to say... I've been trying to wear thongs... nop just not for me :(. love being comfortable while I'm doing my workouts. These sport underwear are very soft, good quality, last long. Real size. Size chart is very real, you can check your size on that. My hips are 37 inches and I got size M. Fit just perfect not too tight not to loose. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Brito

customer_reviews.title: Great underwear
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on a strenuous 10 mile hike in the mountains yesterday and experienced no bunching, no wedgies, and they stayed put the entire way. I really like these underwear and will probably buy some more. On a side note, I came across these while looking for comparable underwear to ExOfficio, which I see others have commented on also. These say they have "odor resistance technology" but I can't find anywhere where it states they're actually treated with antimicrobial, like the ExOfficio's. The material is also heavier and will take longer to air dry. I will wear them for everyday but I don't think I'll take these on our AT section hikes. Still.... very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: The best all-day active underwear I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: It's odd to be excited by your underwear, yet here I am. I walked, ran, hiked, and cleaned my house all day in these... In 90+ degree heat with sweltering humidity. No swamp ass. None. No funky stank. None. I'm active and I SWEAT. I can't believe how well this wicks moisture and keeps me dry and comfortable during the most arduous workouts. Cannot recommend more highly! Edit: I'm 5'9", 165 lbs., wear a size 10, and have giant thighs. The large fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJean Graham

customer_reviews.title: BEST briefs for hot, steamy temperatures!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Mission Trip to Haiti in November, where the temperature was 97 degree's and 100% humidity. Because this was a church trip in partnership with Mission of Hope, we were not allowed to wear tank tops or shorts, so think hot, steamy, sweaty, dirty...every day...for 7 days! Ugh. These briefs far exceeded my expectations! I was amazed at how well they fit, how they didn't ride up and how dry I was the entire week. When I was returning home, I donated all of my long skirts and over sized t-shirts to MOH, but no-way was I giving these up!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Feels like the panty section of a pair of tights or pantyhose, so no thank you
customer_reviews.text: Get some tights or light-control pantyhose, cut the legs off, and you have these. Not a fan. When it's regularly over 100° outside, that isn't the fabric / texture that I enjoy next to my body, & I don't think it is very healthy to wear regularly. We also had the issue some others mentioned, with LONG strings suddenly beginning to unravel after initial washes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Menstruation
customer_reviews.text: This is great underwear! I used 100% cotton (the standard Hanes) all my life and I will never switch back now. I feel dry all day long and they do not dig into my hips at all. The only down side is that they do not work well with pass, the adhesive does not stick. I tried buying pads with wings and found that the adhesive stuck too much to the outside of the fabric. When I tried to remove the pad the plastic ripped and would not come off of the underwear. I now use menstrual panties during my cycle and these for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kinney

customer_reviews.title: wedgies galore. if you have somewhat of a booty, avoid
customer_reviews.text: there are only two types of underwear: those that give you wedgies and those that don't. this product belongs in the former category, which is why it gets one star. the fabric is pretty comfy when you first put it on until you get a wedgie. i don't even have a big butt but if you have a butt that's just a bit bigger than average ,it will give you wedgies. if you are looking for a wedgie free panty, buy the ones from Hane's. They have many underwear that explicitly promise to not ride up (not all styles, so check their official website). I will be sending these back and sticking with Hanes undies
customer_reviews.author: Essentialist

customer_reviews.title: I thought these were the best, but looks like they wear out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these panties fit. They’re incredibly soft and smooth. They dry fast. However, after about 5-7 times washing and drying, they began to develope piles and the strings started to come out, as you can see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE. I am a 14-16 and the XL in ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE. I am a 14-16 and the XL in this pantie style is perfect. Has a little tummy support but ride just perfect on the body. Like a good bikini should. I'm washing cold, gentle and line dry cuz I want them to LAST and stay so supportive BUT I'm a nervous nelly when it comes to wash ~ I'll bet these are fine for regular wash/dry (but I didn't really look at recommendations - sorry). Like this color scheme. I recommend them! Will go back to Balanced Tech for more.
customer_reviews.author: Chelseael

customer_reviews.title: First wash stamping fell off
customer_reviews.text: Like any new underwear I wash before wearing them. On first wash, the inside stamping - the size and materials and washing instructions- all just fell off on not just one pair but all of them. When I first saw it I thought one pair was a fluke, but all 8 pair was defective. They fit true to size however just laying down they are bunching between my butt checks. I might expect this from me moving but I’m just laying in bed. As far as claim to moisture wicking I don’t think so, I just got out of the shower, dried everything really well, baby powdered and the moisture is still there.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best. Panties. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Alright so I’m a big girl waist down. Like my thighs close shut, and if you might now that means I’m sweaty down there a lot. It’s awful and I was ashamed and felt uncomfortable at the gym or even just walking around during the Texan summer heat. After some health concerns, I’m sure you’ll know what I mean, I stumbled across these babies. LET ME TELL YOU: these are amazing!! They feel like nothing, super comfy and ZERO sweat! I never felt so great in underwear. No sweating and also they stay put all day. I will definitely order a second pack.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Alber

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Customer service came through, great product!
customer_reviews.text: The good: these are great for exercising or just everyday use, I think I sweat more than the average person and these undergarments really help wick the sweat from my legs. The bad: the seams come undone on multiple pairs, I have 12 total. I didn't worry about loose threads and seams, it was just the fabric along the edges coming undone. BUT one had a large hole in the seam along the crotch immediately after putting them on. UPDATE: After a misunderstanding with customer service, they did get back to me with a personal apology and replaced the pairs that were defective. I've redacted my previous statement about poor customer service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Jensen

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: Rant warning.. Purchased these because some of the reviews said they prevented chafing. They actually caused more irritation than any other pairs of panties I own and were extremely uncomfortable. I cannot say whether or not they're moisture wicking because I could not stand to wear them long enough to tell. Wore a pair for a few hours and ended up throwing them away. ☹ Also, why is it impossible to find a pair of panties that are moisture wicking, don't cause irritation & chafing, and are actually pretty?! UGH I think I need to make it my personal mission to design a decent panty lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Ritch

customer_reviews.title: Sizing all wrong, big disappoint
customer_reviews.text: i was really looking forward to these seamless briefs! The sizing is totally wrong though. I ordered a large (I'm 67 yrs old and have a 38 hip) to allow for any shrinking after washing them but as soon as I took them out of the package I knew there was no way these were going to fit. The material was a disappoint and I'm sure wouldn't last after a washing. Wouldn't suggest these for any age or size. Returned these the next morning and refund was not a problem. Thank you Amazon for an easy return. Looking for something else right now!
customer_reviews.author: R. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these!! They are my go-to travel underwear (and for any outdoor activity). They "stay" exactly where they should, dry quickly after washing (or sweating), are comfortable, and fit as expected. I wore them every day for 6 weeks, and they showed minimal signs of wear. I've continued to wear them for another 4 months (less frequently), and they are showing slightly more signs of wear (minor pilling), but I assume I will be able to wear them frequently for at least another year. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Stark

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not sweat resistant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly to help keep my sweat under control and they didn’t work. I work out for over an hour and I sweat a lot! My sweat went right through the underwear through my pants just like when I wear basic cotton. They fit too perfect to where you can see the panty lines on my bottom however they are comfortable. I can say that it does help slightly on the odor compared to cotton underwear, but not 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basic panty!
customer_reviews.text: Being able to shop for comfy panties a thing of the past for women. I have found that shopping in stores you pay anywhere from$5-10 per panty, and anything "bulk" is trash quality. I purchased these out of a whim, and will NEVER go back to other basic panties in stores. They are so breathable, light, comfy, and colorful--perfect for wearing at work or throughout the school day with minimal lines. The colors are vibrant and stay so after several washes. I cannot wait to replace most of the pairs in my drawer with these. 100% worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fit
customer_reviews.text: These are for gals with no behind and no curves what so ever. I am 5'3 160lbs and I have a normal behind. These did not move with me. They cover your behind but when you move they go up your behind. Material is soft but they very uncomfortable. There is no room for curves, making them feel like an old pair of boys jeans.
customer_reviews.author: B. Denise

customer_reviews.title: Comfy wicking work out panties are comfy and dry quickly
customer_reviews.text: These undies are really hipsters, not bikinis as stated. However, I like the hipsters and had read other reviews noting the same. The fabric is very nice...stretchy and soft. The undies do ride up a bit but I don't have much of a butt to hold the undies down. I ordered a small which fits fine. I am 5'4" and weigh 112. ). I think this is a great value. I wore a pair today to work out and they felt great and dried quickly after sweating for 40 minutes. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Best underware Ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading about it in Women's Health or Shape magazine. I workout everyday as well as hike and to be honest don't care for sweat in my privates so I tried this underwear both this style as well as the thong. IT IS AWESOME!!!! It wicks away all moisture. There is no chafing and they are comfortable. I am a small/xsmall and the small's work perfectly. These are the best undies for working out or being active and keeping your lady area dry.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: ... different colors and in bikini style however they seemed like hipsters. I loved the colors and quality so ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these before in different colors and in bikini style however they seemed like hipsters. I loved the colors and quality so I was okay with them and thought maybe this company was different in style/fit. So I ordered this set also in bikini but I got a big surprise. The black, grey, nude, white, and lilac are truly bikini and the purple are bigger (like hipster). But I did not notice until after a washed them. This is a little disappointing but I will wear them anyway. The colors and quality are still good.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Headley

customer_reviews.title: I love these underwear
customer_reviews.text: I love these underwear. I have a smaller waist and larger butt and they stay in place for the most part. They are the only full bottom underwear I will purchase. I normally only wear these to sleep in since I generally wear thongs (but I buy the same brand of thongs). I swear by these underwear. They are all I purchase anymore. I live in a hot and muggy climate and they keep my cool and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Keri L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy waist and leg band - feels so smooth. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The waist and leg bands are so comfy. I usually buy cotton underwear. My old stand-by, Hanes underwear, are no longer comfortable. I've bought two different styles of Hanes but I find the band is rough and uncomfortable. These Balanced Tech bikinis are stretchy and fit well without gaps and they are soft and smooth around my waist and thighs. I bought medium and I'm 5'6", 130 lbs, and have an athletic build. They are not too big on me. I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie on the coast

customer_reviews.title: well fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit reference: 5'5", 120 lbs, 26" waist, 36" hip, size small Fits perfectly and stays in place. Minimal panty lines, fits like hip huggers. I have worn them under workout tights for exercise class, resistance training, regular yoga, aerial yoga, and hot yoga. Works as expected. For hot yoga, all my clothes were wet by the end of class but I didn't feel like I was sitting in a pool.
customer_reviews.author: onlineshopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent undies for an “apple” shape body!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit & material. I’m 5’8” 190 lb older woman with a thick waist, flat butt and “no” hips. I’ve recently lost 30lbs (retirement is so fun!) & needed to replace all my travel undies. I purchased size xl. Most undies slither down my flat ass or try to be butt floss. Also, the price is more than fair. I bought 2 more sets after wearing my first pair today.
customer_reviews.author: Winkie

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest undies EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love these undies—They are the comfiest I’ve ever owned, they fit amazingly, and they stay put even during rigorous exercise. If they were cotton, I would wear them all the time (that’s my only issue with them so far.) I was concerned with other reviews that said they fell apart, so I’ve been washing them in a lingerie bag on warm with the rest of my laundry; it’s true that the writing on the back waist band started peeling immediately after the first wash, but that’s the only problem I’ve had with them, and it’s not been bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: J&S

customer_reviews.title: MOISTURE WICK
customer_reviews.text: These panties did exactly what I needed them to do. When I work out or just doing work that requires a lot of movement I sweat in my private areas. Regular panties whether lace, cotton or other material just does not keep my dry. I put these panties to the test this weekend working in a warehouse and I stayed dry!! This was a great investment and I will order more. Comfortable panties with no ride up and great moisture wick protection to help keep you dry and rash free.
customer_reviews.author: april jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love these underwear!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous to try these, as they looked a little more like bikinis than hipsters, but I am in love with them! They are a perfect fit (I ordered smalls, and wear size 6 in most pants, or s/m in other underwear brands), very comfortable, stay put all day at work, minimal panty lines, and are very breathable. Great price compared to Exofficio and other performance undies. Thinking about getting another 6 pack!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie S

customer_reviews.title: she looks great in them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife at her request, she looks great in them. When I asked her how they fit she said good but "they go up your butt sometimes, and that is normal for women's underwear unless you wear granny panties" That has to suck, if 100 % of my underware gave me a wedgie I would go commando.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth order of these panties - I find them to be just as advertised and they are comfortable, fit like a dream and are cool to wear. The only negative is that I sometimes have to cut a stray string from the top band but this is a minor thing. For the price, you cannot beat the quality. Compares nicely to what I used to buy from a brick and mortar department store for a fair amount more.
customer_reviews.author: SJW

customer_reviews.title: Crossfit approved
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for some underwear that would stay put for my Crossfit workouts and these are perfect. No visibly panty line and no wedgies, they stay in place! I will say, they don't wick away sweat so after an intense workout they are pretty damp. I also wear tight compression pants so I don't think any panties would stay dry given the circumstances. These fit true to size and have washed up fine. The multi color pair are slightly thicker than the plain, no problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I did measure myself to be absolutely sure, and I fit in the size 12 range in these. Alas, too small. I was hoping these would meet my need for quick drying travel underwear, and these had great reviews. Unfortunately, they are too small. They create a muffin top, and a muffin bottom around the hips. I will be returning them, since it’s a waste of almost $30 for the six pairs to sit in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: I'll Never Wear Any Other Underwear
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but was recommended these underwear. After buying and trying them for myself, I have fallen in love. Now I dread laundry day when I have to wear other underwear to wash them. They are amazing and comfortable. I would recommend buying a size larger. I'm well-endowed in the lower region and normally wear a large, but ordered the XL. They fit perfectly. I hope they will eventually make more styles so I can stock my drawers with only these!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, bad dye
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and cut of these underwear. Not too snug, but never ride up. I definitely carry weight in my butt, so perhaps that is why they fit me perfectly. However, I have noticed on runs where I get sweaty, the dye on these comes off on my skin in some spots despite them being washed several times. So, I end up with black or pink dye on my bikini line. It washes off, so it isn't a deal breaker, but I will probably try something new the next time I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephout

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Easy to Wear
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable. Great wicking material. I got these to wear at Disney World and they were great. Comfortable with all of the in and out of rides and the hot weather. I found these again in my drawer and ordered a dozen more to replace all of my cotton patties. Smooth material that doesn’t stick to your jeans or pants. So soft and so great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Swaab

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great fit
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear all-cotton underwear but these are amazing. Super lightweight, breathable material feels like you aren't wearing anything. They're especially great for anything hot and sweaty, whether it's working out or just daily life in the summertime. Even after multiple washes they don't stretch out, and will stay put throughout the day (no falling down or riding up) while not feeling tight or too small. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. L.

customer_reviews.title: They did not stay up!
customer_reviews.text: I had purched this product a few years ago. I loved them for the gym and cannot let go of the pairs that are wearing out. I specifically looked for this brand and style, but was sooo disappointed. These do not stay up just walking/day to day activities. They would never last during a workout or the gym. They did not stay up on my hips and just roll down.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fit well. Thicker, more durable fabric (not thin ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Thicker, more durable fabric (not thin and flimsy). Don't ride up. They are a bit taller than I expected by an inch or 2, but not ridiculously high [not granny-panties].
customer_reviews.author: koolgeek

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected!
customer_reviews.text: For years I wore this brand size medium or size large panties. The sizing has changed. I purchased a size extra large and they are the same size as my old her panties. If you have purchased these before please purchase one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I thought these panties would be like ex officio (only less expensive) but they aren’t. They’re made of thicker material that’s a bit scratchy and feels artificial. They’re also smaller than I expected for something billed as a “hipster”. I’ll probably keep them, but won’t order again.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy1350

customer_reviews.title: If you have a gut, stay away
customer_reviews.text: Based on the glowing reviews I bought these. I'm 195 lbs size 16-18 in pants, and bought size XL. Waistband rolls all the way down almost immediately. If I hike them high enough to not roll down, the leg holes are up into my belly area. Two stars because the material does seem good, but they're about useless for actual exercise (I bought them for running and the elliptical).
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great panties, but run small
customer_reviews.text: The feel of these is great but the sizing is way off. I’m 5’2” and size 4 and so ordered a size small per sizing guideline. They are very tight around my thighs and waist. Recommend sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Not as  advertised
customer_reviews.text: These were marketed as quick dry. I took them to Europe for 10 weeks and found them to be anything but quick drying as my regular underwear dried much faster than these.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndie

customer_reviews.title: The best workout panties I have ever owed!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these panties! They fit like a dream. Don’t ride up while working out and they do wick the moisture away after a very sweaty workout. I would also wear these out for long summer days. I wear a size 14 and although the size chart recommended XL, the Large fit perfect. I guess it depends on your body shape. Great quality for a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Active wear undies
customer_reviews.text: Great undies, fit well. I thought they were a little thick but aren't uncomfortable. They do roll down a little with heat and activity, but do mostly stay in place. I don't have to think about them doing weird things which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: nice fitting underwear
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder for me because I have liked them so well. However, the sizing is now smaller. My previous mediums fit and these are just a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine S

customer_reviews.title: Almost five stars, but not quite
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, and although they are thin and are "breathable", they do not have a thick enough piece of material in the crotch area. I was hoping they would be a bit more substantial. Also you can still see the line through pants. But since they're stretchy, they aren't tight on my legs like most cotton underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Knucklehead211

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer Undies
customer_reviews.text: When the temperature gets hot, my body will sweat profusely. It was getting to the point where I didn't even know why I was wearing underwear. My normal cotton undies would get SOAKED with sweat. Thank goodness I decided to try these out. They are true to size, keep me comfortable, and stay put (no twisting or sagging). I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: sarahhh

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable that I wear them daily
customer_reviews.text: Update: I’m buying another pack of 6 as these are my go to panties. So comfy and durable. I purchased these for our upcoming trip to Europe. I purchased another brand (ExOfficio), however, they aren't nearly as comfortable as these are. I wear these daily they fit and feel so good. I will definitely buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenRyszka

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable under garments I have ever worn. There isn’t any ride up and I honesty, you forget they are there. The material is like a spandex and smooth material. Like workout pants. The new part, there isn’t a tag. Perfect for working out in and there isn’t even shrinkage when they are washed.
customer_reviews.author: OREO

customer_reviews.title: Great for work outs!
customer_reviews.text: Great undies for workouts! Thick material is great quality and will last through harsh work outs, running, and washes for time to come. The undies fit high on the waist (nearly at my belly button) and the bikini is full coverage. True to size with great stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good breathe able undies for working out
customer_reviews.text: Good for bottom covering underwear. Felt like the material was very breathe able and I could probably run 4 miles without it feeling hot/swampy down there. The only concern is that the back of the underwear is very high, so your underwear would probably show with jeans or any lower cut pants.
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Even with all the positive reviews of this product, I wasn't expecting too much. However, these fit so well and are so comfortable, I might buy more. They are perfect for working out or just hanging around the house. Moisture wicking is great and they are a good alternative to cotton panties when doing any activity in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Rides up! Big leg holes
customer_reviews.text: Would give 1 star but I’m having problems finding panties that fit, so I’m taking ownership. That said, I adjusted to a 3. I thought I liked them, but the leg holes seem big and they ride up after a short time. FWIW I have a flat abdomen but so is my bass and that might be the problem? Nothing to anchor or catch on?
customer_reviews.author: DogsRFamily

customer_reviews.title: Best underwear ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best underwear I have ever purchased. They are so soft and comfortable. They are very stretchy, so they do not leave marks on my hips or hurt my hips. The only weird thing about them is that they almost reach my bellybutton, they are not low riding underwear. Plus, they make my butt look great.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable or light weight
customer_reviews.text: These fit fine, but they aren't for me, especially when exercising. They are not breathable for workouts and the fabric is pretty thick compared to the description/what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: JPinNC

customer_reviews.title: Great sweat absorption
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely my favorite underwear. They fit excellent and have great moisture wicking. Comfortable enough for everyday wear and durable enough for running/hiking/weight lifting when I sweat a lot. I would highly highly recommend these! I like that the rise is a little bit higher as they help hold things in place a little bit more
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love these panties!
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable, buttery soft, and stretchy. They might show with leggings, depending on how thick said leggings are. The only reason for four stars instead of five is because this newer batch that has the "Balanced Tech" writing on the inside of the back (above the size and fabric info) seem to snag more easily than the older ones I have that say "Balanced Tech" on the outside of the waistband.
customer_reviews.author: alphajuice14

customer_reviews.title: I needed something cool and breathable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear during workouts and bike commutes to work. I needed something cool and breathable, and with no seam down the middle to prevent chafing. These work great. The seams do show under leggings though.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Chan Yeh

customer_reviews.title: Magical!!
customer_reviews.text: This underwear is seriously magical. Absolutely no smell when wearing them even when sweating. I would probably order up if you want them comfortable instead of a little snug feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: it seems to be pretty high quality material
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. Otherwise, it seems to be pretty high quality material. Rides up a bit more than the average though.
customer_reviews.author: ZVB

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercising
customer_reviews.text: These are the best underwear for exercising. They’re snug and won’t fall down, pull up, or bunch, no matter how active you are. Nice sleek look. Classy black so even if my teammates accidentally see them it doesn’t bother me. Have even worn them as a swimsuit bottom.
customer_reviews.author: TigerLily

customer_reviews.title: Marky Mark effect and not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: No seamless and so big. Not big as in size but big as in too much fabric and a lot of coverage. Full disclosure, I am 5’ tall but small undies usually fit me well; this ones show when I wear jeans (like show in the waist area, think Marky Mark).
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: I have to wash completely separate from anything else which is annoying. Can't even throw them in the dirty clothes ...
customer_reviews.text: I give this 3 stars just because the pink ones color is not set and anything it touches turns pink when wet. I have to wash completely separate from anything else which is annoying. Can't even throw them in the dirty clothes with the other laundry. But they are comfortable and don't ride.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: They aren't invisible under workout clothes (bummer) but are comfortable under them
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the comfort of these panties. They aren't invisible under workout clothes (bummer) but are comfortable under them. They have held up pretty well in the wash too. I will probably keep buying them until I find something that is a bit more seamless. A good value and good coverage! They don't ride up or cut into the leg so I'm pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry so fast
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but I really like these! I work out in them and find that my underwear dries quickly after sweating, which helps me feel fresh. I bought them for traveling since they can be washed and air dry quickly, but I wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: They are the best underwear I’ve ever bought they sit perfect never ride up I jog a lot and they are so comfortable.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are right- great underwear!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a comfortable pair of undies for a while, and after seeing reviews on these, I decided to try them. They fit great! Perfect coverage on my bum, and they don’t ride up! I will be happily wearing this brand for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and breathable material
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and breathable material. I know some people had concerns about the waist line being too thick, but honestly, I wear these to the gym, hanging around the house, and to work (as an EMT) and they are great! Buying a second pack now :)
customer_reviews.author: Private Seller

customer_reviews.title: Product Name Incorrect - Product Received Had Obvious Seams.
customer_reviews.text: The product I received had very obvious and thick seams. Also, it looked like someone had opened it before. Thankfully the underwear itself still looked flatpacked and unused. The underwear itself looks like great material, but I needed seamless/no seam panties so I had to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit! I am 5'4" and ordered small as suggested in previous reviews. I like the coverage, they dont ride up, but are a little tiny tight in waist... but I have a more wide type waist than most. Still really like these.
customer_reviews.author: TKat

customer_reviews.title: Not Seamless
customer_reviews.text: Not seamless. Very thick material is easily seen under clothing. Very comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: ASGarcia

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: These fit nicely (I wear a size 12) and wash well. Delivery was timely. They are a single layer of fabric that is not cotton. I don’t know how well they breathe or moisture wick, but I have had no problems and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, follow the size guide, they are a little stretchy. Fantastic for workouts or if your hiking/camping. No chaffing or irritation either. I'm a 32in inseam for Levi's skinny jeans or a 12 short for most jeans - hope that helps for sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Riina

customer_reviews.title: Best underwear EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these underwear!!! Extremely comfortable. Great for working out (you don't feel all sweaty and stinky afterwards). Wash great. Fit it perfect! 10/10 would recommend!! I'll definitely be purchasing more!!
customer_reviews.author: KailaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a valuable workout assistant
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they fit nicely and wick moisture very well. I think most of the negative reviews have to do with underwear lines and these definitely have them, but I also haven’t found an affordable set that stays in place without those! So yes they do show lines, but they stay in place nicely and work well when I work out!
customer_reviews.author: Markie Re

customer_reviews.title: best panties money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: the description says it all for these highly impressive performance undies! the colors are vibrant and beautiful - my neighbors apparently could see them from two houses away. nothing creepy, just must have caught their eye. "balanced" is right, as I can say the overall body felt way more balanced and at peace with the garment on. it sucks that they're likely not water resistant, because I never want to take them off! "hipster" is also right, you could basically get away with wearing these out to the coffee shop assuming weather permits. best panties money can buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Hipster fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit more like hipster than bikini style. I would have loved them if they weren’t constantly riding up. I ordered Large in the blue and black ones, and I normally wear a 6 bikini or 7 hipster (though I don’t like hipster). They were great for hiking, aside from the riding up issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Daniel

customer_reviews.title: BEST underwear I have bought ever
customer_reviews.text: BEST underwear I have bought ever!!!!! getting more.... Fit well, true size (in small: 5.4 and 137lb) sturdy, do not shrink, you dont feel them! Really, these are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Val - Mass

customer_reviews.title: Love these for hiking/backpacking/camping
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, wicks away sweat, minimises odor. These are great for hiking, camping and backpacking, in hot weather, cold weather or any weather and yes, for wearing several days straight. Disgusting I know, but I did not smell. Will buy them again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: The waist is a little higher than I would like, but overall these were a good purchase. They are comfortable, made of a moisture wicking material, and do not ride up. They do show a slight underwear line and are not as thin as the other brand I purchased. I like the fact that they are all black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but they do ride and show lines.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for two reasons, they weren’t supposed to ride up and there were no panty lines. I can’t say that either feature is found in these panties but they are comfy and stay close to the body so I like them.
customer_reviews.author: LLK

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and lightweight and stretch very well
customer_reviews.text: These are just as I expected. They are nice and lightweight and stretch very well, great fit. They definitely do make a difference during hot days and worksouts. I've had no riding up with these and I will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Mvaro

customer_reviews.title: What's Not to Love?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, combined with a fabric that is both stretchy and fitting. I love this underwear, and prefer it over the Exofficial Underwear for it's more affordable price and great functioning. I like underwear that offers support and comfortability, not those lace things that barely exist. This brand gives me exactly what I want, and looks nothing like the typical "granny panties". Couldn't be more pleased. Note that the deep purple color is my favorite, a beautiful shade!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and strong
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know where these underwear have been all my life but I will never buy another competitors brand again. These are so comfortable and strong. I barely feel them on and yet know they are protecting me underneath my pants. The beige/light skin colored ones(I’m fair skin) are perfect for any clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Balanced Tech Women's workout panties
customer_reviews.text: Balanced Tech underwear are perfect for working out. Comfortable, lightweight, and temperature regulating, they've become my favorite for all workouts. Although lightweight, they are not flimsily constructed as some of the competitors. They wash well and retain their shape and color.
customer_reviews.author: Grauzellen

customer_reviews.title: Not Seamless!
customer_reviews.text: These are not completely seamless and they still show under leggings. There are seams in the crotch that are visible from the rear when worn under tight clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love these.  Only underwear I have worn in the last few years.
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered a size down since I lost weight. Seem true to size. So comfortable and dont ride up at all which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Reordered and got something different
customer_reviews.text: Reordered but got back something smaller and a different cut. Not as wisking as my first order. I felt quite soaked after exercising. Hate to keep these if they aren’t going to fit and not going to work away sweat. Pictured is my old pair on top of new ordered pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rom

customer_reviews.title: Keeping fit
customer_reviews.text: These are as they say. I like how they fit when I workout, no movement and no other issues. Washed and worn and staying together nicely. Ordered another set so there is one for everyday day if they week.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrin A Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Keeps me dry during the day when sitting, moving, playing with my kids. Great undies that don’t ride up and stay in place, all while keeping you dry on a hot day. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my favorite brand of underwear was discontinued. I like them well enough, and they are much, much cheaper, so I'll stick with them, depending on how well these hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dunphy

product_meta.title: Balanced Tech Women's 6 Pack Seamless Hipster Brief Bikini Panties
product_meta.description:
This 6 Pack seamless Bikinis From Balanced Tech is made from lightweight 92% Nylon/8% Elastane fabric that's super soft and comfortable and provides anti-odor and Breath-ability that moves moisture away from the body and QUICK DRY moisture control technology ensures fast drying, Four-Way Stretch conforms to the body for excellent support, plus the Seamless-style underwear to ensure Comfort While minimizing visible panty lines, Athletic cut panty underwear has full front coverage and moderate full seat coverage. This economical 6-pack is a smart investment for any woman's active attire collection.

About the Brand - "Balanced Tech" is an active-wear brand that infuses technology, Driven by the latest trends with style and comfort for everyday goals and challenges. Whether you are working up a serious sweat or hanging out on a Sunday, you can always look and feel great with Balanced Tech!
feature_bullets: Each 6 Pack includes 3 assorted colors lightweight super comfort seamless Mid-rise bikini panties underwear
Odor resistance and Moisture wicking performance technology, keeps you fresh and feeling dry throughout your day
Tag-less labeling and no seam design eliminates chafing while minimizing no show panty lines, features full coverage
Quick dry, Wash on the Go with these and breathable athletic briefs, ensures fast drying perfect for traveling and active lifestyle
Stay in place 4 way stretch ultra-comfortable nylon elastane fabric allows for freedom of movement and conforms to the body for great mid rise support
